function tco(f) {
            var value;
            var active = false;
            var accumulated = [];
            return function accumulator() {
                accumulated.push(arguments);
                // 当递归的时候，检查active，清除调用栈
                if (!active) {
                    active = true;
                    while (accumulated.length) {
                        value = f.apply(this, accumulated.shift());
                        console.log(value)
                    }
                    active = false;
                    return value;
                }
            };
        }

        var sum = tco(function (x, y) {
            if (y > 0) {
                return sum(x + 1, y - 1)
            } else {
                return x
            }
        });

        console.log(sum(1, 3))
